        public static <T> T decodeValue(String str,

        Decode a given JSON string to a POJO of the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type.
        Parameters:
        str - the JSON string.
        type - the type to map to.
        Returns:
        an instance of T
        Throws:
        DecodeException - when there is a parsing or invalid mapping.
